name: Generation Sales Group
tag_list: b2b, appointment-setting, lead-generation, sales-services, channel-sales, outsources-sales, outsourced-marketing
overview:
Generation Sales Group is a leading sales services firm focused on helping companies improve revenues in the business-to-business sales environment.

Generation Sales helps companies increase sales by cold calling, generating qualified sales leads, and setting qualified appointments. These qualified appointments, in turn, assist companies in acquiring new clients.
